thread.title: How to Go to Bora Bora for Free
thread.title_full: How to Go to Bora Bora for Free -- The Cut

author: The Cut
title: How to Go to Bora Bora for Free
text:
Photo: Courtesy of St. Regis, Bora Bora
If you've dreamed of living in your very own Lifestyles of the Rich and Famous episode, here's your chance. The Cut and Allure have joined forces to pamper our readers with the ultimate getaway. One lucky person will win a trip for two to Bora Bora. Round-trip airfare, a five-night stay at the ultraluxurious St. Regis hotel, and a couple's massage at the resort's Clarins spa is on us. You won't have to worry about packing a toiletry bag either, since this giveaway comes equipped with a suitcase filled with Allure -curated beauty finds, too. To enter, complete this form by November 20. Good luck!
